A

AbstractBoard - Class in com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board
A board defines connections between Territories, it has different constraints based on its size, amount of Players, and other factors in Configuration.
AbstractBoard(Game, Configuration) - Constructor for class com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board.AbstractBoard
Saves the configuration used for making this game because it is important for balancing the number of Players that start with Territories.
AbstractBoardView - Class in com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars

Territory - Class in com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.game.board
A Territory is the smallest division that can be owned by a Player in DiceWars.
